zen.text: The best leaders of all, the people know not they exist. They turn to each other and say We did it ourselves.
A beautiful woman who is pleasing to men is good only for frightening fish when she falls into the water.
A closed mouth gathers no foot.
A follower of the way has neither form nor shape, neither root nor trunk; nor dwelling place; like a fish leaping in the water.
A good teacher opens the door for you, but you must enter the room by yourself.
A hut full of laughter is richer than a palace full of sadness.
A mountain never yields to the wind no matter how strong it is.
A person who is capable of blushing cannot have a bad heart.
A strong man overcomes an obstacle, a wise man goes the whole way.
A thousand-mile journey begins with just one step.
Always look on the bright side of things. If you can’t comprehend this, polish that which has become dull until it begins to shine.
At the still-point in the center of the circle one can see the infinite in all things.
Be master of mind rather than mastered by mind.
Before you criticize someone, you should walk a mile in their shoes. That way, when you criticize them, you’re a mile away and you have their shoes.
Better to see the face than to hear the name.
Better to sit all night than to go to bed with a dragon.
Better to struggle with a sick jackass than carry the wood by yourself.
Chop wood, carry water.
Confuse them with your silence and amaze them with your actions.
Do not walk behind me, for I may not lead. Do not walk ahead of me, for I may not follow. Do not walk beside me either. Just pretty much leave me the hell alone.
Don’t be afraid that you do not know something. Be afraid of not learning about it.
Don’t be afraid to go slowly. Be afraid of stopping.
Don’t be irreplaceable. If you can’t be replaced, you can’t be promoted.
Don’t be satisfied with your accomplishment, nor be dissatisfied with it.
Don’t speak if it doesn’t improve on silence.
Duct tape is like ‘The Force’. It has a light side and a dark side, and it holds the universe together.
Even if you stumble and fall down, it doesn’t mean you’ve chosen the wrong path.
Even the happiness of a fool is a stupid kind of happiness.
Everyday life is the way.
Everyone seems normal until you get to know them.
Experience is something you don’t get until just after you need it.
From the withered tree, a flower blooms.
Generally speaking, you aren’t learning much when your lips are moving.
Give a man a fish and he will eat for a day. Teach him how to fish, and he will sit in a boat and drink beer all day.
Good judgment comes from bad experience, and a lot of that comes from bad judgment.
Great Faith. Great Doubt. Great Effort.
zen.category: the three qualities necessary for training. – zen

zen.text: Hating someone makes them important. Forgiving them makes them obsolete.
If at first you don’t succeed, skydiving is not for you.
If you do not get it from yourself, Where will you go for it?
If you ever feel you are worthless remember that you are full of expensive organs.
If you lend someone $20 and never see that person again, it was probably worth it.
If you think nobody cares if you’re alive, try missing a couple of car payments.
If you want a certain thing, you must first be a certain person. Once you are that certain person, obtaining that certain thing will no longer be a concern of yours.
If you’ve made a mistake, it’s better just to laugh at it.
If you’re attached to anything, you surely will go far astray.
In studying the way, realizing it is hard; once you have realized it, preserving it is hard. When you can preserve it, putting it into practice is hard.
It takes a wise man to learn from his mistakes, but an even wiser man to learn from others.
It’s always darkest before dawn. So if you’re going to steal your neighbor’s newspaper, that’s the time to do it.
It’s better be a person for a day than to be a shadow for days.
It’s not about approving or liking, but just being able to allow the world to be the way it is without resenting, hating, or judging it.
Knock on the sky and Listen to the sound.
Knowledge is learning something everyday. Wisdom is letting go of something everyday.
Learning Zen is a phenomenon of gold & dung. Before you learn it, it’s like gold; after you learn it, it’s like dung.
Let go over a cliff, die completely, and then come back to life — after that you cannot be deceived.
Let go, or be dragged.
Life is the only thing worth living for.
Live calmly. The time will come when the flowers bloom by themselves.
Man stands in his own shadow and wonders why it is dark.
Move and the way will open.
Never test the depth of the water with both feet.
No matter what happens, somebody will find a way to take it too seriously.
No one returns from a long journey the same person they were before.
No snowflake ever falls in the wrong place.
One moon shows in every pool, in every pool the one moon.
Only when you can be extremely pliable and soft can you be extremely hard and strong.
Sit, walk, or run, but don’t wobble.
Some days you’re the bug; some days you’re the windshield.
Someone who points out your flaws to you is not necessarily your enemy. Someone who speaks of your virtues is not necessarily your friend.
Still water has no mind to receive the image of the migrating geese.
The best time to plant a tree was years ago. The second best time is now.
The Buddha talked about saving all beings from delusion, not converting them to a new religion.
The goal in life is to die young, but to do as late as possible.
The infinite is in the finite of every instant.
The instant you speak about a thing, you miss the mark.
The man who moved the mountain was the one who began carrying away the smallest stones.
The mind should be as a mirror.
The obstacle is the path.
The one who is good at shooting does not hit the center of the target.
The quickest way to double your money is to fold it in half and put it back in your pocket.
The temptation to give up is strongest just before victory.
The wise adapt themselves to circumstances, as water molds itself to the pitcher.
There’s no such thing as a friend who doesn’t have any flaws. But if you try to look for all their flaws, you will remain with no friends.
To follow the path, look to the master, follow the master, walk with the master, see through the master, become the master.
To know and not do is not yet to know.
Unhappiness enters through a door that has been left open.
What was never lost can never be found.
Whatever happens always happens on time.
When an ordinary man attains knowledge, he is a sage; when a sage attains understanding, he is an ordinary man.
When eating bamboo sprouts, remember the man who planted them.
When the pupil is ready to learn, a teacher will appear.
When the student is ready, the teacher will appear.
When walking, walk. When eating, eat.
When you get to the top of the mountain, keep climbing.
When you reach the top, keep climbing.
When you seek it, you cannot find it.
Where there is great doubt, there will be great awakening; small doubt, small awakening, no doubt, no awakening.
Where you are right now is where you are.
Words diminish meanings; these words included.
You are exactly where you need to be.
You should sit and meditate for 20 minutes, unless you’re too busy, then you should sit and meditate or an hour.
Your home is where your thoughts find peace.
The Great Way is not difficult for those who have no preferences.
Only when you can be extremely pliable and soft can you be extremely hard and strong.
No snowflake ever falls in the wrong place.
Do not seek the truth, only cease to cherish your opinions.
The obstacle is the path.
In studying the way, realizing it is hard; once you have realized it, preserving it is hard. When you can preserve it, putting it into practice is hard.
Sitting quietly, doing nothing, spring comes and the grass grows by itself.
Knowledge is learning something every day. Wisdom is letting go of something every day.
Sit, walk, or run, but don’t wobble.
One day a student asked Taiga, "What is the most difficult part of painting?" Taiga answered, "The part of the paper where nothing is painted is the most difficult.
Let go over a cliff, die completely, and then come back to life — after that you cannot be deceived.
